## cltECIPITATION

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
clt <- read.csv('../data/validation/clt.csv')
clt_long <- clt |> pivot_longer(!time, names_to = "model", values_to = "value")
```


```{r}
ggplot(clt_long) +
  geom_density(aes(x=value,color=model))
```
